content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per my latest actions, I received a list of popular online games from the 'google' command and attempted to play games on Poki.com using the 'xdg-open' command. In the latest development, I used the 'browse_website' command to access the website 'https://www.gamesradar.com/best-online-games/' and received a list of 25 of the best online games to play today, including popular titles such as Fortnite, League of Legends, and Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. I also received links to the website and social media pages. Additionally, I used the 'execute_shell' command to open the website for Fortnite on Epic Games. However, in my previous attempt to use the 'xdg-open' command, I received an error message stating that the terminal type is unknown and the command could not find the necessary programs to open the website."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\\n\\n  Your Terminal type is unknown!\\n\\n  Enter a terminal type: [vt100] \\nTERMINAL TYPE IS SET TO y\\n\\n\\n  Your Terminal type is unknown!\\n\\n  Enter a terminal type: [vt100] \\nTERMINAL TYPE IS SET TO y\\n\'\nSTDERR:\nb"Terminal initialisation failed - unknown terminal type?\\n/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: links2: not found\\n/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: elinks: not found\\n/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: links: not found\\nTerminal initialisation failed - unknown terminal type?\\n/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: w3m: not found\\nxdg-open: no method available for opening \'https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/en-US/home\'\\n"'}]
"""
